panels.description: A histogram quantile of the API requests grouped by methods and bucket (duration) size.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum (rate(gitpod_server_api_calls_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", method=~"$method"}[5m])) by (method, le))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum (rate(gitpod_server_api_calls_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", method=~"$method"}[5m])) by (method, le))

panels.title: API request duration 50th
